election_record.label: Virginia 1798 Clerk of the House of Delegates

office.name: Clerk of the House of Delegates

role.title: Clerk of the House of Delegates

sub_unit.name: House of Delegates
sub_unit.note: "Yesterday the General Assemby of this Commonwealth met at the Capitol in this city. ~ John Wise was chosen Speaker and Mr. John Stewart Clerk." The Virginia Argus (Richmond, VA). December 4, 1798.

election_record.reference: Leonard, Cynthia Miller, ed. The General Assembly of Virginia, July 30, 1619 - January 11, 1978: A Bicentennial Register of Members. Richmond: Virginia State Library, 1978.
